original_text: There was a man who lived in Lystra. His feet had been weak since he was born. So he had never been able to walk.
korean_text: 루스드라에 발을 쓰지 못하는 한 사람이 앉아 있는데 나면서 걷지 못하게 되어 걸어 본 적이 없는 자라

sentences.original_text: There was a man who lived in Lystra
His feet had been weak since he was born
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 태어날 때부터 발을 저는 사람이었고

sentences.original_text: So he had never been able to walk
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 결코 걸을 수 없었던 사람이었습니다
